name: GeriatricDepressionScaleShortFormTotalScoreInPoints
title: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form Total Score (in points)
description: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form Total Score (in points) LOINC
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes to identify the Geriatric Depression Screening (GDS) tool.),(Data Element Scope: This value set was intended to identify patients who were assessed to using the Geriatric Depression Screening (GDS) tool.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only the total score for the GDS and the GDS short version.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes all the individual questions for the GDS and the GDS short tool.)
